name: Secoda
long_description:
Secoda helps data teams deliver trustworthy data for AI and analytics. With Secoda’s search-first approach, your data catalogue won’t collect dust—easily search across all columns, tables, dashboards, events, and metrics. Ask any question and get fast, contextual answers powered by AI.

Built to empower teams, Secoda combines data cataloging, governance, and observability into one seamless platform that’s accessible, intuitive, and even self-hosted if needed. Whether you need a data dictionary, column-level lineage, or AI-powered insights, Secoda makes discovering, understanding, and trusting your data effortless for every employee.
one_liner: The second brain for your data team
